articles.content: Marking its 15th anniversary this week, the India Art Fair (IAF) in New Delhi, South Asias premier commercial art event, returns to the NSIC Exhibition Grounds (1-4 February) for its largest edition … [+3011 chars]

articles.author: Aparupa Devnath
articles.title: Mrunal Thakur is a modern muse embracing traditional splendor - IndiaTimes
articles.description: Mrunal Thakur effortlessly blends modern fashion with traditional elegance in her ethnic wear...
articles.content: Mrunal's ethnic wear choices often feature graceful silhouettes that enhance her natural beauty. Whether it's sarees, lehengas, or anarkalis, she embraces styles that exude sophistication.
